author: HemantMahawar
body:
Windows: `<user`>\appdata\Local\Microsoft\PowerShell\`<version`>
Linux: `<user dir`>/.PowerShell
OS X: `<user dir`>/.PowerShell

This cache is used for ModuleAnalysis, CommandAnalysis, PowerShellGet, ScheduledJobs, ISE

> NOTE: For built-in PowerShell, the cache location is <user>\appdata\Local\Microsoft\Windows\PowerShell

comments.author: HemantMahawar
comments.body:
@lzybkr Do we need version subfolder for PowerShell cache?
@joeyaiello Does legal has a opinion on location

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: The analysis cache format won't change often - so perhaps the filename should be versioned.

title: Need to have correct per user PowerShell cache location
